user.title: PoolSync Setup: Connect to Device
user.description: Enter the local IP address of your AutoPilot PoolSync device.

link.title: PoolSync Setup: Link Device
link.description:
Press the 'Service' button on your PoolSync device located at `{ip_address}`.

The system will wait for confirmation. You have approximately `{time_remaining}` seconds remaining.

If this step times out or fails, you may need to restart the PoolSync device before trying again.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the PoolSync device at the specified IP address. Please check the IP address and ensure the device is powered on and connected to the network.
error.invalid_ip: The IP address format is invalid. Please enter a valid IP address (e.g., 192.168.1.100).
error.api_error: An API error occurred while communicating with the PoolSync device. Check Home Assistant logs for more details. The device might have responded with an unexpected message.
error.link_failed: The linking process failed. The device did not provide a valid password after the button press, or a communication error occurred during linking. Please try again. You may need to restart your PoolSync device.
error.link_timeout: The linking process timed out. The 'Service' button was not pressed within the allowed time, or the device did not respond with a password. Please try adding the integration again. You may need to restart your PoolSync device.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the Home Assistant logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This PoolSync device (based on its MAC address) is already configured.
abort.internal_error: An internal error occurred in the configuration flow. Please try again.
abort.internal_error_polling_setup: Internal setup error during the device linking (polling) phase. Please try again.

init.title: PoolSync Options
init.description: Adjust settings for the PoolSync integration. The current update interval is {current_interval} seconds.

error.invalid_scan_interval: The scan interval must be a number greater than or equal to 10 seconds (e.g., 30, 60, 120).
